title: Ascension: The End Game
description: "Ascension: The End Game" is the second installment in the Ascension sci-fi adventure series. A sequel to "The Rising Son", it continues with the tale about Apollo, Solomon and Grace and the war waged by the Corsair against their home city of Alcazar. Disguised as a Corsair soldier, Apollo finds himself struggling with what to do in order to get back to his home. Meanwhile, Solomon and Grace barely manage to avoid certain death from their Corsair captives, as changing circumstances alter alliances. New characters are introduced and result in some people finding themselves in places they never knew existed. It all culminates at the Ceremony of Ascension, where even more secrets are revealed causing new conflicts and hinting at unknown forces yet to be unleashed.
author: A.P. West
